description: Maintained and enhanced web applications using modern technologies, ensuring seamless user experiences and optimal performance.
achievements: Maintained web applications using React for the frontend and Node.js and Spring for the backend, ensuring seamless user experiences
Leveraged Google Cloud to deploy and manage applications, improving scalability and reliability
Integrated GraphQL APIs to optimize data fetching and improve application performance
Participated in code reviews and aligned to best practices for coding standards, leading to a 30% reduction in bugs and improved code maintainability
